name: Create LeanKit card from ServiceNow notification
transformation:
servicenow_notification = in_dict['data']

NO_TITLE = u'NO TITLE PROVIDED'
NO_DESCRITPION = u'NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED'

out_dict = {
  "Title": servicenow_notification.get('short_description', None) or NO_TITLE,
  "Description": servicenow_notification.get('description', None) or NO_DESCRITPION,
  # "TypeId": 246277520,
  "Priority": 1 
}

print in_dict
print out_dict
